00018 #ifndef _CVBBDPRE_IMPL_H
00019 #define _CVBBDPRE_IMPL_H
00020 
00021 #ifdef __cplusplus  /* wrapper to enable C++ usage */
00022 extern "C" {

00026 #include <sundials/sundials_band.h>
00027 
00028 /*
00029  * -----------------------------------------------------------------
00030  * Type: CVBBDPrecData
00031  * -----------------------------------------------------------------
00032  */
00033 
00034 typedef struct {
00035 
00036   /* passed by user to CVBBDPrecAlloc and used by PrecSetup/PrecSolve */
00037 
00038   long int mudq, mldq, mukeep, mlkeep;
00039   realtype dqrely;
00040   CVLocalFn gloc;
00041   CVCommFn cfn;
00042 
00043   /* set by CVBBDPrecSetup and used by CVBBDPrecSolve */
00044 
00045   BandMat savedJ;
00046   BandMat savedP;
00047   long int *pivots;
00048 
00049   /* set by CVBBDPrecAlloc and used by CVBBDPrecSetup */
00050 
00051   long int n_local;
00052 
00053   /* available for optional output */
00054 
00055   long int rpwsize;
00056   long int ipwsize;
00057   long int nge;
00058 
00059   /* pointer to cvode_mem */
00060 
00061   void *cvode_mem;
00062 
00063 } *CVBBDPrecData;
00064 
00065 /*
00066  * -----------------------------------------------------------------
00067  * CVBBDPRE error messages
00068  * -----------------------------------------------------------------
00069  */
00070 
00071 #define MSGBBDP_CVMEM_NULL "Integrator memory is NULL."
00072 #define MSGBBDP_MEM_FAIL "A memory request failed."
00073 #define MSGBBDP_BAD_NVECTOR "A required vector operation is not implemented."
00074 #define MSGBBDP_PDATA_NULL "BBDPrecData is NULL."
00075 #define MSGBBDP_FUNC_FAILED "The gloc or cfn routine failed in an unrecoverable manner."
00076 
00077 #ifdef __cplusplus
00078 }
